node.builder.attachment.helper: This field only accepts PNG and PDF files.
node.builder.attachment.label: Upload an attachment (optional)
node.builder.newsletter-type.label: Category
node.builder.recipients.helper: If you leave this field in blank the mail will be sent to all the recipients.
node.builder.recipients.label: Select a recipients list (optional)
node.builder.subject.label: Mail subject
node.builder.template.helper: If you leave this field in blank the mail body will be empty.
node.builder.template.label: Select a template (optional)
node.builder.title: quick start
node.builder.subtitle: Fill in the required fields and select the configuration of your newsletter.
node.idle.manual-setup.title: manual setup
node.idle.quick-start.title: quick start
node.idle.title: create newsletter
node.idle.subtitle: Welcome to the newsletter creation portal. In this section you can decide whether to create a completely new one or use previously registered elements.
node.newsletter.title: mail configuration
node.newsletter.subtitle: In this section you must add the subject of the email and the type of your newsletter, this will help to communicate better with your audience, you can also optionally upload an attached file.
node.recipients.terms: I agree that all contacts in this import expect to hear from my organization. I can confirm that this listing was not purchased, rented, aggregated, or provided by any third party.
node.recipients.title: recipients
node.recipients.subtitle: In this section you can upload a list of recipients for your newsletter. It is necessary to fill in both fields to be able to create a list, however if you do not need to use this option at this time you can click on the next button, by doing this you will be accepting that your newsletter is sent to your entire audience.
node.results.title: results
node.results.subtitle: The newsletter has been successfully sent to the recipients list.
node.review.title: summary
node.review.subtitle: In this section you can validate the information of your newsletter before it is sent.
node.template.title: create template
node.template.subtitle: In this section you can create a template for your completely personalized newsletter, in case you do not need to use this option at this time you can click on next.
